channel.title: Wepon animations
channel.description:
Yo, none of my weps have animations when you attack! All they do is move like when your punching...
Please help! ~Johno

item.title: Wepon animations
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

I have nonoe of what you said in my client.java. I though wep animations for players would be in playerhandler? And for NPC’s in npc handler?

Read full topic

item.title: Wepon animations
item.dc:creator: @pk_george1 pk george1
item.description:
@pk_george1 wrote:

hello,

You have to go into your client.java and search for

public int GetWepAnim(int id)

You will see that there is already alot of others there. eg

}
if(id == 837)
{
return 1084;
}

Thats the one for the rune c’bow

There are 3 different sections to this one for , standing , attacking and running.

They carry on from eachother

Read full topic
